sentence: The view from the spa pool is absolutely amazing
The housekeeping staff was amazing and kept our room spotless
Our rating for the rooms is 5The Food We found the overall quality of the food to be very good to excellent

We loved the grounds we felt absolutely safe all of the time note that you can lock your room when you are in it as some reviews have noted that you do not lock the doors actually there is no need to during the day as the grounds are secure and patrolled by security day and night

It was a very very sensual experience applying a special mud treatment to your partners body get a couples massage in a room with a view and relaxing afterwards on a private patio with fruit and water a shower and hot tub
I remembered a place with giant boulders leading into the ocean The Baths and thought that might be a fun place to go
Spacious with fabulous views out every window
Outdoor shower best bed to sleep in so comfortable I wanted to take it home
Room decor and layout was very nice
I also appreciated the thorough servicing of the room in the morning and at turn down
butler serviced 17 rooms hardly personal service
overall service was sub par on almost all fronts food service room service ocean attendants etc
Nothing was included with the room charge
The rooms have all been refurbished but we were very disappointed with both the design and quality
The butlers did not give us an adequate introduction to the property room services etc
While not unavoidable it was also frustrating to have all the water out on the property one evening right before dinner so that we were not able to shower
No water hot or cold in the room on arrival with no offer of a room change
It was inconvenient to have them there when I was trying to shower after working out at the gym
On the afternoon of our last day we returned to the room after being at the beach and found a bucket of ice on the table
Banquette furniture much too low for the tables
